channel.description: Recent content in reactive on Dev's Log

item.title: Reactive Programming with Go
item.description: ReactiveX, or Rx for short, is an API for programming with Observable streams. ReactiveX is a new, alternative way of asynchronous programming to callbacks, promises, and deferred. It is about processing streams of events of items, with events being any occurrences or changes within the system.
